content.stimulus_en: We (compare) ________ different places.
Let's (check) ________ the answers.
I (learn) ________ about the past simple.
They (be) ________ the best students.
She (not/have) ________ any mistakes.
How (be) ________ the test?
Let's move on to the next module.
I now can describe my childhood memories.
The test results were very positive.
I more feel confident with past tenses now.
This is the end of the third module.
Make you sure review the irregular verbs.
The past or related word for Resumen is '________'.
